vocabInfos.mediumDef:
1) hook, ring, fetter, brooch
1a) hook, ring (in nose of captive)
1b) hook, ring (as jewellery)
1b1) nose ring
1b2) bracelet
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 鉤子, 環, 腳镣
1a) 鉤子, 環 (俘虜戴在鼻上)
1b) 鉤子, 環狀物 (首飾)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 钩子, 环, 脚镣
1a) 钩子, 环 (俘虏戴在鼻上)
1b) 钩子, 环状物 (首饰)
